recipe.title: Mushroom Spinach Soup
recipe.instructions: 1. Saute onion, celery. garlic and mushrooms in butter until tender. Add spinach, chicken broth and heavy cream. Bring to a simmer. Add pepper and salt. Thicken with Roux. Garnish with a slice of mushroom and fresh chopped spinach.
